entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries and ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
